title: US stock market futures steady as Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq hover near record highs amid Fed rate cut hopes and Middle East ceasefire stability
description: US Stock market today remains steady as Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq futures trade flat near record highs. Hopes for interest rate cuts grew after Fed Chair Jerome Powell signaled that rate reductions could happen “sooner rather than later.” Investors are closely watching Powells second round of testimony today and the upcoming May PCE inflation report, the Feds preferred inflation gauge. Meanwhile, calm in the Middle East, thanks to a US-brokered ceasefire between Israel and Iran under President Trump, is adding stability. Traders now await key data to see if a fresh rally can push markets to all-time highs.
